title: Initial value problems on cohomogeneity one manifolds, I
abstract:
We study initial value problems for various geometric equations on a
cohomogeneity manifold near a singular orbit. We show that when prescribing the
Ricci curvature, or finding solutions to the Einstein and soliton equations,
there exist solutions near the singular orbit, unique up to a finite number of
constants. In part I we make a special assumption that significantly simplifies
the proof, and will solve the general case in Part II.
